sub_title: Quantitative Risk Modeller at ABN AMRO | Risk Data & Analytics | Modelling Team
summary:
• Professional with a passion for creative problem-solving and working with collaborative, cross-functional teams at organizations that value innovation.
• Data Scientist and Engineer with 2+ years’ experience in applying machine learning techniques within the field of predictive analytics.
• Quantitative Risk Modeller with 10+ years’ experience in applied mathematics, IT, and statistical modelling.
• Skills: Applied Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Certification, Certified Credit Risk Modeller (SAS), Data Engineering (Python, PySpark, R, SQL, SAS), Data Science (Python), Text-Mining (Python), Big Data (PySpark), Data Visualization (Python)
• Multi-lingual: Dutch,  English, Mandarin-Chinese,and Cantonese-Chinese.
• During my free time:  eating out with my wife Lisa & twin daughters, practicing internal martial art (Taiji), practicing detailed visual memory to fold complex origami.

education.field_of_study: Business Mathematics and Informatics (Q4-1999 till Q1-2005)

certifications.name: Applied Artificial Intelligence Certification
certifications.authority: Columbia University in the City of New York

certifications.name: Applied Machine Learning Certification
certifications.authority: Columbia University in the City of New York

certifications.name: Oxford Fintech Programme

company.name: Saïd Business School, University of Oxford
ABN AMRO | Risk Data & Analytics | Modelling Team

profile_positions.company: ABN AMRO | Risk Data & Analytics | Modelling Team
profile_positions.description:
Tasked to review the PD, LGD, and EAD models of ABN AMRO Commercial Finance, and Global Corporate Rating Model of NPL
• Applied data engineering skills to create credit risk modelling data sets based on new data quality standard enforced by Model Validation for Basel IV.
• Utilized text mining to enrich the link between clients’ data and various data sources for the portfolio.
• Completed the proof of concept using non-native dataset, FERMAT, to monitor the performance of Non-Retail Loans’ LGD models.
profile_positions.title: Quantitative Risk Modeller

company.name: ABN AMRO Innovation Center | R-LAB | Advanced Data Analytics Team

profile_positions.company: ABN AMRO Innovation Center | R-LAB | Advanced Data Analytics Team
profile_positions.description:
Applied data science and statistics to develop non-regulatory models to improve and provide insight into the credit approval process.
• Utilized Topic Modelling (Natural Language Processing) to determine changes in word variation across thousands of documents, measuring changes occurring over time as clients’ credit risk quality worsened.
• Leveraged word distance algorithms (e.g. Levenshtein distance) to identify potential fraudulent clients from thousands of historical text files based on occurrences of specific keywords provided by Non-Financial Risk Grid.
• Developed predictive model for the Dutch hotel industry using features constructed from event data (e.g. concerts, festivals), reviews of hotel guests, payment behavior data collected from the bank transaction data warehouse. Utilized various ML techniques such as Regression Trees, OLS Regression, and Random Forrest Regression.
• Developed proof of concept (POC) model to determine likelihood that shops in the Netherlands empty for at least N months within the coming year. Features and emptiness status constructed based on Dutch Chamber of Commerce and Locatus data. Utilized Logistic Regression to test POC model development.
• Applied data engineering in SAS to create time series per postal area enabling Dynamic Linear Modelling to forecast the number of empty shops after N months.
• Collaborated with developers to implement data methodology in HADOOP PySpark.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

company.name: ABN AMRO | Non-Retail Lending Modelling Team

profile_positions.company: ABN AMRO | Non-Retail Lending Modelling Team
profile_positions.description:
Quantified the credit risk for a wide variety of local and international corporate and private clients’ loans.
• Integrated and maintained all relevant models into the team’s business operations after the Group Risk Management branch (responsible for global credit risk models) was dismantled.
• Contributed to the attainment of organization-wide AIRB Basel compliance status by combining historical data of Fortis and ABN AMRO portfolios to create combined PD models, integrating non-financial risk drivers into the Dutch corporate PD model, and standardizing the ex-Fortis LGD data into the predefined format of ABN AMRO.
• Contributed to the attainment of AIRB status for 85% of the total portfolio by modelling the in-default LGD model, redeveloping the large corporate rating model, and obtaining more accurate allocation of regulatory capital by removing unnecessary implicit/explicit conservatism embedded in historical data. Completed review of the Public Entities (low default) PD model.
profile_positions.title: Quantitative Credit Risk Modeller

company.name: ABN AMRO Commercial Finance | Basel Modelling Team

profile_positions.company: ABN AMRO Commercial Finance | Basel Modelling Team
profile_positions.description:
Developed LGD model for the factoring business of ABN AMRO Commercial Finance recourse portfolio for the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and the Netherlands.
• Structured corresponding EAD model development project and advised the modelling team of ABN AMRO Commercial Finance on how to model according to the organization’s modelling guidelines and principles.
• Created SAS macro scripts tailored to ACF default datasets to streamline analysis.
profile_positions.title: Basel Modeller (Job Rotation)

profile_positions.description:
Built a statistical model for LGD stress testing to gain insight into the behavior of future loss rates with macroeconomic variables.
• Developed time-series of LGDs based on active noise reduction procedure.
• Performed an iterative and repetitive process carried out with respect to the data logic and domain knowledge of officers in late collections.
profile_positions.title: Data Engineer (Job Rotation)

company.name: ABN AMRO | Retail Lending Modelling Team

profile_positions.company: ABN AMRO | Retail Lending Modelling Team
profile_positions.description:
Collaborated with the Basel Modelling Team on retail loans through a critical time during which the organization was understaffed. Accomplished goals set by management, while adhering to strict regulatory conditions.
• Developed scripts for automatic periodical validation for standard retail portfolios which led to the AIRB designation for largest corresponding retail models. The scripts developed during this time are currently still in use.
• Integrated two non-retail portfolios into the retail approach, including the development of corresponding PD, LGD, and EAD models (6 models in total) which were subsequently approved for AIRB status.
profile_positions.title: Quantitative Credit Risk Modeller

profile_positions.description:
Develop an application scorecard for the British Lease Market.
Responsibility: Collect and prepare data, data mining, statistical analysis, SAS programming ,reporting to stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Scorecard developer
